Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A simple prayer to the Virgin Mary — one quatrain

BLEge3245.Transcription: MArye blisful mayde & mod[   ] perethis nyht thy blissyng [    ] and thy sonis dere…
BLEge3245.Note:
Written as prose, almost illegible; not f. 198v as in Robbins (1939)

             “The Gurney Series of Religious Lyrics.” 
             PMLA
         54 (1939): 369-90.
